org.prebake.js
Interface Executor

All Known Implementing Classes:
RhinoExecutor
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface Executor

Abstracts away execution of script.

Nested Class Summary
Modifier and Type Interface and Description
static class Executor.AbnormalExitException
          Exposed via Executor.Output.exit when JavaScript raises an exception.
static class Executor.Factory
          Creates instances of Executor.
static class Executor.Input
          An input JavaScript file.
static class Executor.Output<T>
          The results of script execution.
static class Executor.ScriptTimeoutException
          Raised by run(java.lang.Class, java.util.logging.Logger, org.prebake.js.Loader, org.prebake.js.Executor.Input...) when a script runs for too long.
 
Method Summary
Modifier and Type Method and Description
<T> Executor.Output<T>
run(java.lang.Class<T> expectedResultType, java.util.logging.Logger logger, Loader loader, Executor.Input... input)
          Execute in the context of the given bindings and coerce the result to the given type.
 

Method Detail

run

<T> Executor.Output<T> run(java.lang.Class<T> expectedResultType,
                           java.util.logging.Logger logger,
                           @Nullable
                           Loader loader,
                           Executor.Input... input)
Execute in the context of the given bindings and coerce the result to the given type.

Returns:
a result with exit set to an Executor.AbnormalExitException if the script could not produce a result.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassCastException - if the result could not be coerced to the expectedReturnType.
